settings.subtext: you’ve been chosen for our exclusive pilot loyalty program! friends with benefits custom salon rewards beta* is our newest way of saying thank you for being such a loving and loyal customer.

settings.title: earn free full-size products, tools, and retailing support — all salons are welcome no matter the size!
settings.subtext: shop for custom rewards every month using your gift card allowance.​

settings.copy_block:
how to earn?

your total monthly amika purchases determine your qualifying level. purchase at least $500 in amika products from your distributor per month to qualify.

are you an independent stylist?

single-operators can qualify for custom rewards by purchasing at least $750 in amika products from your distributor over a 3-month period.**

at the beginning of each month, amika will email you a pre-loaded digital gift card with your rewards allowance earned based on the prior month’s purchases.*** each gift card is valid for 60 days.

example

total purchases from distributor in april = $1000​

rewards total received from amika in may = $170 (17%)

disclaimer

*this is a limited-time, exclusive pilot program available only to salons serviced by goldwell of ny.purchases through any other distributor will not count toward fwb: custom salon rewards. the program launches april 1st 2021 and is subject to change or cancellation at any time.

​ **fiscal quarters january-march, april-june, july-september, or october-december.

***for independent stylists, quarterly rewards will be issued via gift card during the first month following quarter close.​​

settings.title: let’s take this relationship to the next level

settings.question: do rewards expire?
settings.answer: yes, e-gift cards expire 60 days after they are issued.

settings.question: do my purchases with another distributor count?​
settings.answer: this is a limited-time, exclusive pilot program available only to salons serviced by goldwell of ny. purchases through any other distributor will not count.

settings.question: can I order all my amika direct?​
settings.answer: no, the custom salon rewards portal does not allow cash payments of more than $10. regular product orders must go through your professional distributor.

settings.question: I am an independent stylist and I purchase more than $500 per month. can I receive monthly rewards?
settings.answer: absolutely! please communicate to your salon consultant that you would prefer to be recognized as a salon for monthly rewards. if you participate in the monthly program, however, you are not able to revert to quarterly should you miss the monthly qualification minimums.

settings.question: how can I check my monthly purchase total?
settings.answer: contact your distributor sales consultant to request an update on your monthly purchase total.

settings.question: how do I spend my rewards?
settings.answer: spending your rewards is as simple as shopping the site, filling your cart, and checking out – at checkout, you will be prompted to enter your e-gift card code(s) as rewards tender. the custom salon rewards portal does not allow cash payments of more than $10 and your cart may need to be adjusted to comply with this threshold.

settings.question: I’m also an amika salon affiliate – do my monthly sales count towards friends with benefits: custom salon rewards? ​
settings.answer: at this time, friends with benefits: custom salon rewards only accounts for purchases through your distributor.
